behavior: Substitution - distributes z to both x and y then applies
Konstant - always returns first argument discarding second
Composition - applies f to result of g x
Flip - swaps second and third arguments
Duplicate - applies f to x twice
Swap - applies f to x (flipped application)

ski_derivation: S (K (S I I)) (S (S (K S) K) (K (S I I)))
behavior: Fixed point - Y f reduces to f (Y f)

notation: E f g h x y
